alert.note: Alert for Clay; Hamilton (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 09 at 8:56PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Clay County through 945 PM CDT... At 856 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Harvard, or 14 miles east of Hastings, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Harvard around 900 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Clay Center, Sutton and Saronville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
